entry.title: National promising to spend $31 billion on transport projects if they’re elected

media:group.media:title: National promising to spend $31 billion on transport projects if they’re elected
media:group.media:description: Major projects include an additional Auckland Harbour crossing with at least one tunnel for road, rail and public transport and a four-lane expressway linking Whangārei and Tauranga.

entry.title: Victoria breaks daily Covid-19 cases record again

media:group.media:title: Victoria breaks daily Covid-19 cases record again
media:group.media:description: There were 428 new cases in the state, with 370 of them suspected community transmissions while three more people have died, all elderly.

entry.title: Banning Facebook not a solution to silencing people, says social media expert

media:group.media:description: Coca Cola, Lego, and Ice Breaker have boycotted Facebook but now Samoa is seriously considering banning it.

entry.title: Judith Collins shuffles National’s lineup after retirements of Nikki Kaye and Amy Adams
